title: Japan’s “five-foot giant” of international relations | Center for the Humanities

quotes: As United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees, Sadako Ogata was known for her on-the-ground presence, such as this visit to a camp for Rwandan refugees in what was then Zaire in February 1995.

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: People throughout the United Nations spoke about her with great affection and respect.
